types:type.name: orderData
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type orderData = {| Status: String, LastModifiedDate: String, AccountId: String, OrderNumber: String, ContractId: String, TotalAmount: Number {"typeId": "int"}, StatusCode: String, IsReductionOrder: Boolean, BillingAddress: {| State: String, Street: String, PostalCode: String, Country: String, City: String |}, OwnerId: String, CreatedById: String, ChangeEventHeader: {| commitNumber: Number {"typeId": "double"}, commitUser: String, sequenceNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, entityName: String, changeType: String, changedFields: Array<Any>, changeOrigin: String, transactionKey: String, commitTimestamp: Number {"typeId": "double"}, recordIds: Array<String> |}, ShippingAddress: {| Street: String, PostalCode: String, Country: String |}, CreatedDate: String, LastModifiedById: String, EffectiveDate: String |} {"example": "{\\\"Status\\\":\\\"Draft\\\",\\\"LastModifiedDate\\\":\\\"2020-08-12T06:50:34.000Z\\\",\\\"AccountId\\\":\\\"0013t00001ZcrLNAAZ\\\",\\\"OrderNumber\\\":\\\"00000102\\\",\\\"ContractId\\\":\\\"8003t000008RPOUAA4\\\",\\\"TotalAmount\\\":0,\\\"StatusCode\\\":\\\"Draft\\\",\\\"IsReductionOrder\\\":false,\\\"BillingAddress\\\":{\\\"State\\\":\\\"DL\\\",\\\"Street\\\":\\\"1426 types:type.name: orderOutput
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type orderOutput = {| orderNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, orderDate: String, requiredDate: String, shippedDate: String, status: String, comments: String, customerNumber: String |} {"example": "{\\\"orderNumber\\\":877989,\\\"orderDate\\\":\\\"2020-12-12\\\",\\\"requiredDate\\\":\\\"2020-12-12\\\",\\\"shippedDate\\\":\\\"2020-12-12\\\",\\\"status\\\":\\\"Created\\\",\\\"comments\\\":\\\"Order Created\\\",\\\"customerNumber\\\":\\\"141\\\"}"}
